page.title: 07Education - My School - 2
page.content: In the school there are about 200 children and ten teachers. Their names are Mrs. Tolman (Head Teacher) who teaches the first years, Mrs. Baker, Mrs. Lewellyn, Mrs. Grounds, Miss Vincent{(Miss Vincent retires {this year after teaching 40 years in {Dorset), }Mr. Angell (my teacher), Mrs. Grocott and Miss Haysom. Mrs. Bennett and Mrs. Thomas help when someone is ill. There are lots of clubs held in our school including chess, recorders, hockey, country dancing and cricket. We have assembly nearly every day and hymn practice once a week. Elaine Baxter - 8 1/2 years old.
